content: the timeless poncho 1 is as a beautiful simple and timeless pattern it s made using hobbii twister 2 which is a soft and fabulous cake yarn in an abundance of beautiful colour combinations with long colour changes you need one cake for size s/m and one and a half for size l/xl it s easy to make the poncho larger if you wish just continue the pattern until the desired size is reached **materials ** crochet hook no g/6 hobbii twister **measurements ** s/m length from neck to point approx 22 inches width from neck to over the shoulder approx 13 inches l/xl length from neck to point approx 25 inches width from neck to over the shoulder approx 16 inches **gauge ** 4 x 4 inches = 21 stitches x 13 row **supplies** s/m approx 250g 1 skein l/xl approx 320 g 2 skeins **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st** stitch **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **bpdc** back post double_crochet **chain space** chain space 1 https //hobbii com/product-patterns/timeless-poncho-twister utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=timeless-voksen-twister&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/hobbii-twister utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=twister&utm_term=swr
